success_criteria: Chaos drill scenarios documented for signer outage, OPA outage, and storage throttling.
Privileged operations fail-closed when policy or signing is unavailable.
Receipts and recovery evidence are captured in provenance ledger entries.
stop_conditions: Policy evaluation cannot be enforced for privileged operations.
Signing material is unavailable for privileged operation receipts.
Governance or compliance guardrails are violated.
